column4: This is probably going to make me look really stupid, but I recently reconfigured my xorg to include the 2048x1024 option, and now the caps lock key doesn't work. Can someone please advise?
nah gedit is X apps, talking bout vi
- Why can't I edit it in X, and then reboot X?
u can go for it , if x should not have issue, y should i :)
cause X always gives issues wheather x on linux or x -gf's :(
Fairy muff :) - Why doesn't sudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg bring up the file?
- That's it sorted, cheers. Turns I was using "uk" when I should have been using "gb" - WHATS THE DIFFERENCE?!
- Who would have thunk it? - Fixed now anyways so cheers.
